attributes.action: Agree in leaving the EU, negotiate continued Free Movement for All UK citizens.
attributes.additional_details:
UK PM David Cameron indicated resign October 2016 refusing to consider 2nd EU Referendum.

4 million UK citizens have signed second referendum petition.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/131215

Brexit leave campaign claimed UK citizens / business would be better off if they left EU. Citizens would not loose their Freedoms.

Financial sector could be given "preferential treatment," with "Passporting"

All Freedoms enjoyed before 23June 2016 should remain

Alternative call 2nd Referendum
attributes.background:
Brexit vote leave EU resulted in citizens / business of UK & EU loosing Freedoms enjoyed by European citizens of Free Movement in EU

UK financial institutions are seeking special considerations for "Passporting" 

Continued EU Free movement should apply to all or Government call 2nd Referendum.
